list.assistance_dql: select group_name from dm_group where group_name in (select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_coordinators' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED))) union select i_all_users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_coordinators' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)) union select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_coordinators' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)

comment.label_en: The Document Coordinators are responsible for releasing documents as ''Effective'' versions when ready for use.
They are notified when documents are due to be made effective, or due for periodic review, or due to expire,
can suspend / reinstate ''Effective'' versions, and can change the roles assigned to individual documents if necessary.
In the case of Category 3 ''Self-Approved'' documents, the Authors themselves can act as Document Coordinators.

list.assistance_dql: select i_all_users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_authors' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED))

select group_name from dm_group where group_name in (select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_reviewers' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED))) union select i_all_users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_reviewers' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)) union select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_reviewers' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)

comment.label_en: These users will be responsible for reviewing documents related to this product prior to approval (where necessary)
and release as ''Effective'' versions. They may also act as Co-Authors in collaborative editing workflows.

list.assistance_dql: select i_all_users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_approvers' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)) AND ANY i_all_users_names NOT IN (select user_name from dm_user where user_name in ($repeatingvalue(wf_authors)))

comment.label_en: These users are responsible for approving (i.e. signing-off) Category 1-2 documents before they are made ''Effective''.
This does not apply to Category 3 controlled documents, which are self-approved by the Document Authors.

list.assistance_dql: select group_name from dm_group where group_name in (select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_qo_approvers' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED))) union select i_all_users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_qo_approvers' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)) union select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_qo_approvers' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)

comment.label_en: Category 1 controlled documents usually require separate approval by the Quality Organization before they are released,
in addition to the document Approvers. All quality-related documents, such as SOPs, fall into this category.
Specify the default users / groups who should act as Quality Organization Approvers for documents related to this product.

list.assistance_dql: select group_name from dm_group where group_name in (select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_readers' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED))) union select i_all_users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_readers' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)) union select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_readers' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)

comment.label_en: These users will be able to access ''Effective'' versions of product-related documents on a read-only basis.
They will not generally be able to view work-in-progress versions, unless they have designated roles such as Reviewer.

list.assistance_dql: select group_name from dm_group where group_name in (select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_users' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED))) union select i_all_users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_users' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)) union select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_users' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)

comment.label_en: This applies to Category 1 controlled documents only. When these documents are ready for release, they can be
scheduled to become ''Effective'' at some specified date in the future. Members of the ''To Be Read'' Distribution List
are then notified that the new document is imminent, and should confirm that they have read it. The Document
Coordinators can then verify that everyone has read the document prior to making it ''Effective''.

list.assistance_dql: select group_name from dm_group where group_name in (select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_auditors' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED))) union select i_all_users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_auditors' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)) union select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like 'cd%_auditors' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)

comment.label_en: These users are responsible for carrying out internal audits on documents related to this product.
